name: Send message in profile popover take to DM channel

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: RELEASE - TM4J-Key-Mapped-In-Cypress-Release - TM4J key found Cypress release run report  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. Open a thread in a RHS by clicking reply button on a post.
2. Click on the user name to open the profile pop over.
3. Click Send Message.

Repeat the steps above but in step 2. click on the profile picture that will also open a popover.
inline.expectedResult: Observe that the channel was change to the clicked user DM channel AND that the popover CLOSED.
